text: Paul [strongs id="g3972" /], a prisoner [strongs id="g1198" /] of Jesus [strongs id="g2424" /] Christ [strongs id="g5547" /], and [strongs id="g2532" /] Timothy [strongs id="g5095" /] [our] brother [strongs id="g80" /], unto Philemon [strongs id="g5371" /] our [strongs id="g2257" /] dearly beloved [strongs id="g27" /], and [strongs id="g2532" /] fellowlabourer [strongs id="g4904" /],

And [strongs id="g2532" /] to [our] beloved [strongs id="g27" /] Apphia [strongs id="g682" /], and [strongs id="g2532" /] Archippus [strongs id="g751" /] our [strongs id="g2257" /] fellowsoldier [strongs id="g4961" /], and [strongs id="g2532" /] to the church [strongs id="g1577" /] in [strongs id="g2596" /] thy [strongs id="g4675" /] house [strongs id="g3624" /]:

Grace [strongs id="g5485" /] to you [strongs id="g5213" /], and [strongs id="g2532" /] peace [strongs id="g1515" /], from [strongs id="g575" /] God [strongs id="g2316" /] our [strongs id="g2257" /] Father [strongs id="g3962" /] and [strongs id="g2532" /] the Lord [strongs id="g2962" /] Jesus [strongs id="g2424" /] Christ [strongs id="g5547" /].

I thank [strongs id="g2168" tvm="PresActInd" /] my [strongs id="g3450" /] God [strongs id="g2316" /], making [strongs id="g4160" tvm="PresMidPtc" /] mention [strongs id="g3417" /] of thee [strongs id="g4675" /] always [strongs id="g3842" /] in [strongs id="g1909" /] my [strongs id="g3450" /] prayers [strongs id="g4335" /],

Hearing [strongs id="g191" tvm="PresActPtc" /] of thy [strongs id="g4675" /] love [strongs id="g26" /] and [strongs id="g2532" /] faith [strongs id="g4102" /], which [strongs id="g3739" /] thou hast [strongs id="g2192" tvm="PresActInd" /] toward [strongs id="g4314" /] the Lord [strongs id="g2962" /] Jesus [strongs id="g2424" /], and [strongs id="g2532" /] toward [strongs id="g1519" /] all [strongs id="g3956" /] saints [strongs id="g40" /];

That [strongs id="g3704" /] the communication [strongs id="g2842" /] of thy [strongs id="g4675" /] faith [strongs id="g4102" /] may become [strongs id="g1096" tvm="Aor2MidDepSubj" /] effectual [strongs id="g1756" /] by [strongs id="g1722" /] the acknowledging [strongs id="g1922" /] of every [strongs id="g3956" /] good thing [strongs id="g18" /] which [strongs id="g3588" /] is in [strongs id="g1722" /] you [strongs id="g5213" /] in [strongs id="g1519" /] Christ [strongs id="g5547" /] Jesus [strongs id="g2424" /].

For [strongs id="g1063" /] we have [strongs id="g2192" tvm="PresActInd" /] great [strongs id="g4183" /] joy [strongs id="g5485" /] and [strongs id="g2532" /] consolation [strongs id="g3874" /] in [strongs id="g1909" /] thy [strongs id="g4675" /] love [strongs id="g26" /], because [strongs id="g3754" /] the bowels [strongs id="g4698" /] of the saints [strongs id="g40" /] are refreshed [strongs id="g373" tvm="PerfPasInd" /] by [strongs id="g1223" /] thee [strongs id="g4675" /], brother [strongs id="g80" /].

Wherefore [strongs id="g1352" /], though I might be [strongs id="g2192" tvm="PresActPtc" /] much [strongs id="g4183" /] bold [strongs id="g3954" /] in [strongs id="g1722" /] Christ [strongs id="g5547" /] to enjoin [strongs id="g2004" tvm="PresActInf" /] thee [strongs id="g4671" /] that which is convenient [strongs id="g433" tvm="PresActPtc" /],

Yet for [strongs id="g1223" /] love’s [strongs id="g26" /] sake I [strongs id="g3870" /] rather [strongs id="g3123" /] beseech [strongs id="g3870" tvm="PresActInd" /] [thee], being [strongs id="g5607" tvm="PresPtc" /] such an one [strongs id="g5108" /] as [strongs id="g5613" /] Paul [strongs id="g3972" /] the aged [strongs id="g4246" /], and [strongs id="g1161" /] now [strongs id="g3570" /] also [strongs id="g2532" /] a prisoner [strongs id="g1198" /] of Jesus [strongs id="g2424" /] Christ [strongs id="g5547" /].

I beseech [strongs id="g3870" tvm="PresActInd" /] thee [strongs id="g4571" /] for [strongs id="g4012" /] my [strongs id="g1699" /] son [strongs id="g5043" /] Onesimus [strongs id="g3682" /], whom [strongs id="g3739" /] I have begotten [strongs id="g1080" tvm="AorActInd" /] in [strongs id="g1722" /] my [strongs id="g3450" /] bonds [strongs id="g1199" /]:

Which [strongs id="g3588" /] in time past [strongs id="g4218" /] was [strongs id="g890" /] to thee [strongs id="g4671" /] unprofitable [strongs id="g890" /], but [strongs id="g1161" /] now [strongs id="g3570" /] profitable [strongs id="g2173" /] to thee [strongs id="g4671" /] and [strongs id="g2532" /] to me [strongs id="g1698" /]:

Whom [strongs id="g3739" /] I have sent again [strongs id="g375" tvm="AorActInd" /]: thou [strongs id="g4771" /] therefore [strongs id="g1161" /] receive [strongs id="g4355" tvm="Aor2MidImpr" /] him [strongs id="g846" /], that is [strongs id="g5123" tvm="PresInd" /], mine own [strongs id="g1699" /] bowels [strongs id="g4698" /]:

Whom [strongs id="g3739" /] I [strongs id="g1473" /] would [strongs id="g1014" tvm="ImpfMidPasDepInd" /] have retained [strongs id="g2722" tvm="PresActInf" /] with [strongs id="g4314" /] me [strongs id="g1683" /], that [strongs id="g2443" /] in thy [strongs id="g4675" /] stead [strongs id="g5228" /] he might have ministered [strongs id="g1247" tvm="PresActSubj" /] unto me [strongs id="g3427" /] in [strongs id="g1722" /] the bonds [strongs id="g1199" /] of the gospel [strongs id="g2098" /]:

But [strongs id="g1161" /] without [strongs id="g5565" /] thy [strongs id="g4674" /] mind [strongs id="g1106" /] would [strongs id="g2309" tvm="AorActInd" /] I do [strongs id="g4160" tvm="AorActInf" /] nothing [strongs id="g3762" /]; that [strongs id="g3363" /] thy [strongs id="g4675" /] benefit [strongs id="g18" /] should [strongs id="g5600" /] not [strongs id="g3363" /] be [strongs id="g5600" tvm="PresSubj" /] as [strongs id="g5613" /] it were of [strongs id="g2596" /] necessity [strongs id="g318" /], but [strongs id="g235" /] willingly [strongs id="g1595" /] [strongs id="g2596" /].

For [strongs id="g1063" /] [strongs id="g1223" /] perhaps [strongs id="g5029" /] he [strongs id="g5563" /] therefore [strongs id="g5124" /] departed [strongs id="g5563" tvm="AorPasInd" /] for [strongs id="g4314" /] a season [strongs id="g5610" /], that [strongs id="g2443" /] thou shouldest receive [strongs id="g568" tvm="PresActSubj" /] him [strongs id="g846" /] for ever [strongs id="g166" /];

Not now [strongs id="g3765" /] as [strongs id="g5613" /] a servant [strongs id="g1401" /], but [strongs id="g235" /] above [strongs id="g5228" /] a servant [strongs id="g1401" /], a brother [strongs id="g80" /] beloved [strongs id="g27" /], specially [strongs id="g3122" /] to me [strongs id="g1698" /], but [strongs id="g1161" /] how much [strongs id="g4214" /] more [strongs id="g3123" /] unto thee [strongs id="g4671" /], both [strongs id="g2532" /] in [strongs id="g1722" /] the flesh [strongs id="g4561" /], and [strongs id="g2532" /] in [strongs id="g1722" /] the Lord [strongs id="g2962" /]?

If [strongs id="g1487" /] thou count [strongs id="g2192" tvm="PresActInd" /] me [strongs id="g1691" /] therefore [strongs id="g3767" /] a partner [strongs id="g2844" /], receive [strongs id="g4355" tvm="Aor2MidImpr" /] him [strongs id="g846" /] as [strongs id="g5613" /] myself [strongs id="g1691" /].

If [strongs id="g1161" /] [strongs id="g1487" /] he hath wronged [strongs id="g91" tvm="AorActInd" /] thee [strongs id="g4571" /], or [strongs id="g2228" /] oweth [strongs id="g3784" tvm="PresActInd" /] [thee] ought [strongs id="g5100" /], put [strongs id="g1677" /] that [strongs id="g5124" /] on [strongs id="g1677" tvm="PresActImpr" /] mine account [strongs id="g1698" /];

I [strongs id="g1473" /] Paul [strongs id="g3972" /] have written [strongs id="g1125" tvm="AorActInd" /] [it] with mine own [strongs id="g1699" /] hand [strongs id="g5495" /], I [strongs id="g1473" /] will repay [strongs id="g661" tvm="FutActInd" /] [it]: albeit [strongs id="g3363" /] I do [strongs id="g3004" /] not [strongs id="g3363" /] say [strongs id="g3004" tvm="PresActSubj" /] to thee [strongs id="g4671" /] how [strongs id="g3754" /] thou owest [strongs id="g4359" /] unto me [strongs id="g3427" /] even [strongs id="g2532" /] thine own self [strongs id="g4572" /] besides [strongs id="g4359" tvm="PresActInd" /].

Yea [strongs id="g3483" /], brother [strongs id="g80" /], let [strongs id="g3685" /] me [strongs id="g1473" /] have joy [strongs id="g3685" tvm="Aor2MidDepOpt" /] of thee [strongs id="g4675" /] in [strongs id="g1722" /] the Lord [strongs id="g2962" /]: refresh [strongs id="g373" tvm="AorActImpr" /] my [strongs id="g3450" /] bowels [strongs id="g4698" /] in [strongs id="g1722" /] the Lord [strongs id="g2962" /].

Having confidence [strongs id="g3982" tvm="Perf2ActPtc" /] in thy [strongs id="g4675" /] obedience [strongs id="g5218" /] I wrote [strongs id="g1125" tvm="AorActInd" /] unto thee [strongs id="g4671" /], knowing [strongs id="g1492" tvm="PerfActPtc" /] that [strongs id="g3754" /] thou wilt [strongs id="g4160" /] also [strongs id="g2532" /] do [strongs id="g4160" tvm="FutActInd" /] more than [strongs id="g3739" /] [strongs id="g5228" /] I say [strongs id="g3004" tvm="PresActInd" /].

But [strongs id="g1161" /] withal [strongs id="g260" /] prepare [strongs id="g2090" tvm="PresActImpr" /] me [strongs id="g3427" /] also [strongs id="g2532" /] a lodging [strongs id="g3578" /]: for [strongs id="g1063" /] I trust [strongs id="g1679" tvm="PresActInd" /] that [strongs id="g3754" /] through [strongs id="g1223" /] your [strongs id="g5216" /] prayers [strongs id="g4335" /] I shall be given [strongs id="g5483" tvm="FutPasInd" /] unto you [strongs id="g5213" /].

There salute [strongs id="g782" tvm="PresMidPasDepInd" /] thee [strongs id="g4571" /] Epaphras [strongs id="g1889" /], my [strongs id="g3450" /] fellowprisoner [strongs id="g4869" /] in [strongs id="g1722" /] Christ [strongs id="g5547" /] Jesus [strongs id="g2424" /];
Marcus [strongs id="g3138" /], Aristarchus [strongs id="g708" /], Demas [strongs id="g1214" /], Lucas [strongs id="g3065" /], my [strongs id="g3450" /] fellowlabourers [strongs id="g4904" /].

The grace [strongs id="g5485" /] of our [strongs id="g2257" /] Lord [strongs id="g2962" /] Jesus [strongs id="g2424" /] Christ [strongs id="g5547" /] [be] with [strongs id="g3326" /] your [strongs id="g5216" /] spirit [strongs id="g4151" /].
